staticSuggestions.label: sendmail
staticSuggestions.insertText:
sendmail
[
	from: zoho.adminuserid
	to: "$1"
	subject: "$2"
	message: "$3"
];

string.label: contains(str)
string.doc: Checks if the string contains the specified substring.

string.label: notContains(str)
string.doc: Checks if the string does not contain the specified substring.

string.label: containsIgnoreCase(str)
string.doc: Checks if the string contains the specified substring, ignoring case.

string.label: isEmpty()
string.doc: Checks if the string is empty.

string.label: length()
string.doc: Returns the length of the string.

string.label: toLowerCase()
string.doc: Converts the string to lower case.

string.label: toUpperCase()
string.doc: Converts the string to upper case.

string.label: trim()
string.doc: Removes leading and trailing whitespace.

string.label: subString(start, end)
string.doc: Returns a substring from start index to end index.

string.label: indexOf(str)
string.doc: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified substring.

string.label: lastIndexOf(str)
string.doc: Returns the index of the last occurrence of the specified substring.

string.label: startsWith(str)
string.doc: Checks if the string starts with the specified substring.

string.label: endsWith(str)
string.doc: Checks if the string ends with the specified substring.

string.label: replaceAll(old, new)
string.doc: Replaces all occurrences of a substring with another.

string.label: toList(sep)
string.doc: Splits the string into a list based on the separator.

string.label: toNumber()
string.doc: Converts the string to a number.

string.label: toDecimal()
string.doc: Converts the string to a decimal.

string.label: toDate()
string.doc: Converts the string to a date.

string.label: toDateTime()
string.doc: Converts the string to a date-time.

string.label: toString()
string.doc: Converts the value to a string.

string.label: proper()
string.doc: Converts the string to proper case (first letter of each word capitalized).

string.label: left(n)
string.doc: Returns the first n characters of the string.

string.label: right(n)
string.doc: Returns the last n characters of the string.

string.label: mid(start, n)
string.doc: Returns n characters starting from the start index.

string.label: leftpad(n)
string.doc: Pads the string on the left to length n.

string.label: rightpad(n)
string.doc: Pads the string on the right to length n.

string.label: reverse()
string.doc: Reverses the string.

list.label: add(val)
list.doc: Adds an element to the list.

list.label: addAll(otherList)
list.doc: Adds all elements from another list.

list.label: get(index)
list.doc: Returns the element at the specified index.

list.label: size()
list.doc: Returns the number of elements in the list.

list.label: isEmpty()
list.doc: Checks if the list is empty.

list.label: contains(val)
list.doc: Checks if the list contains the specified value.

list.label: remove(index)
list.doc: Removes the element at the specified index.

list.label: clear()
list.doc: Removes all elements from the list.

list.label: sort(asc)
list.doc: Sorts the list in ascending or descending order.

list.label: distinct()
list.doc: Returns a new list with unique elements.

list.label: intersect(otherList)
list.doc: Returns the intersection of two lists.

list.label: subList(start, end)
list.doc: Returns a sublist from start index to end index.

map.label: put(key, val)
map.doc: Adds a key-value pair to the map.

map.label: putAll(otherMap)
map.doc: Adds all entries from another map.

map.label: get(key)
map.doc: Returns the value associated with the specified key.

map.label: getJSON(key)
map.doc: Returns the value as a JSON object.

map.label: keys()
map.doc: Returns a list of keys in the map.

map.label: remove(key)
map.doc: Removes the entry for the specified key.

map.label: size()
map.doc: Returns the number of entries in the map.

map.label: isEmpty()
map.doc: Checks if the map is empty.

map.label: containsKey(key)
map.doc: Checks if the map contains the specified key.

map.label: containsValue(val)
map.doc: Checks if the map contains the specified value.

map.label: clear()
map.doc: Removes all entries from the map.

decimal.label: round(precision)
decimal.doc: Rounds to the specified number of decimal places.

decimal.label: ceil()
decimal.doc: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the number.

decimal.label: floor()
decimal.doc: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the number.

date.label: addDay(n)
date.doc: Adds n days to the date.

date.label: subDay(n)
date.doc: Subtracts n days from the date.

date.label: addMonth(n)
date.doc: Adds n months to the date.

date.label: addYear(n)
date.doc: Adds n years to the date.

date.label: getDay()
date.doc: Returns the day of the month.

date.label: toString(format)
date.doc: Converts to a string with the specified format.

datetime.label: addHour(n)
datetime.doc: Adds n hours to the date-time.

datetime.label: addMinutes(n)
datetime.doc: Adds n minutes to the date-time.

datetime.label: addSeconds(n)
datetime.doc: Adds n seconds to the date-time.

datetime.label: getHour()
datetime.doc: Returns the hour of the day.

datetime.label: toString(format)
datetime.doc: Converts to a string with the specified format.

common.label: isNull()
common.doc: Checks if the value is null.

common.label: toString()
common.doc: Converts the value to a string.

creator.label: uploadFile(file, owner, app, form, id, field)
getRecords(owner, app, report, criteria, page, size, conn)
